page.title: 08MODERN HOUSING IN NETHERLEY
page.content: { Netherley}is a modern housing estate built about fifteen years ago.It contains some blocks of{flats,}rows of {houses}and{maisonettes.}Most residents try to take a pride in their environment but due to several factors parts of Netherley are already being knocked down as slum clearance. { Vandals}came around at night and wrote names all over the walls,set fire to rubbish and smashed windows. Lifts in flats were continually broken. Flats became flooded,damp and dirty. They were{uninhabitable.}Some are in the process of being{demolished}and new houses may be built. One eleven_year old resident writes {"Wherever you walk you see broken {windows.I think it is disgusting.The {field near my house gets used as a {rubbish dump and rats run over it".
